item.title: Davide's Code and Architecture Notes - the Error Management Trio, and how it affects your software architecture
item.description: When designing a software system, we naturally focus more on the happy flow. But we should carefully plan to handle errors that fall into three categories: Validation, Transient, and Fatal. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/architecture-notes/error-management-trio/
